channel.title: Andrew Fiorillo
channel.description: I'm a software engineer with a passion for physics and mathematics.

item.title: A new website
item.description:
Iâ€™ve always had a stop-and-go relationship with personal webpages. In the spirit of change, I decided to revamp my website from the bottom up. It feels cleaner and better suited to posting regular content.

Lukas Himsel designed the theme this site derived from. Thanks Lukas!
